description: This file defines the AuthStorage class which provides methods to persist, retrieve, and clear authentication tokens (access and refresh tokens) using shared preferences in a Flutter application.

classes.name: AuthStorage
classes.description: A utility class for storing and retrieving authentication tokens using persistent storage.

methods.name: saveTokens
methods.description: Saves the access and refresh tokens to persistent storage.

methods.name: getAccessToken
methods.description: Retrieves the access token from persistent storage.

methods.name: getRefreshToken
methods.description: Retrieves the refresh token from persistent storage.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the stored access and refresh tokens from persistent storage.
